Transforming Dentistry with Artificial Intelligence

Revolutionizing dental care through cutting-edge AI technology for precise diagnostics, treatment planning, and patient outcomes

Get Started Learn More

What is Smile AI?

Smile AI is an advanced artificial intelligence platform specifically designed for the dental industry, bringing the power of machine learning and computer vision to dental practices worldwide.

Intelligent Diagnostics

Our AI algorithms analyze dental X-rays and scans with remarkable accuracy, detecting cavities, periodontal diseases, and other oral health conditions that might be missed by the human eye.

Treatment Planning

Generate comprehensive treatment plans instantly, with AI-powered recommendations based on millions of successful cases and the latest dental research.

Time Efficiency

Reduce diagnosis time by up to 70%, allowing dentists to see more patients while maintaining the highest standard of care.

Predictive Analytics

Anticipate potential dental issues before they become serious problems, enabling proactive preventive care for better patient outcomes.

Technology

Powered by state-of-the-art artificial intelligence and machine learning

01

Deep Learning Models

Our neural networks are trained on millions of dental images, achieving diagnostic accuracy that rivals and often exceeds human experts.

02

Computer Vision

Advanced image processing algorithms detect subtle patterns and anomalies in X-rays, intraoral scans, and 3D imaging.

03

Natural Language Processing

Automatically generate detailed reports and patient communications, extracting insights from clinical notes and medical literature.

04

Cloud Infrastructure

Secure, HIPAA-compliant cloud platform ensures your data is protected while providing instant access from anywhere.

05

Continuous Learning

Our AI improves with every scan processed, constantly updating its knowledge base with the latest dental research and techniques.

06

Integration Ready

Seamlessly integrates with existing practice management software and imaging systems through our robust API.

About

Mathesis Labs

Mathesis Labs is at the forefront of applying artificial intelligence to healthcare, with a special focus on transforming dental care through innovative technology solutions.

Our team brings together experts in artificial intelligence, machine learning, dental science, and healthcare technology to create products that make a real difference in patient care. Smile AI represents our commitment to making advanced diagnostic tools accessible to dental practices of all sizes.

Founded on the principle that technology should enhance, not replace, the human touch in healthcare, we work closely with dental professionals to ensure our solutions meet the real-world needs of practitioners and their patients.

1M+ Images Analyzed
500+ Dental Practices
95% Accuracy Rate
24/7 Support
